Title: Relates to requiring certain facilities to have a staff member specifically trained in filing assisted outpatient treatment petitions
Summary: Requires certain hospitals and correctional facilities to have a staff member specifically trained in filing assisted outpatient treatment petitions.
LawCode: Amd ยง9.60, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to requiring certain facilities to have a staff member specifically trained in filing assisted outpatient treatment petitions
